person.persName: Thompson B. Shearer (Madison County, KY, farm laborer)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, farm laborer. Madison County native. Son of Samuel Shearer and Mary “Polly” Arnold Shearer. Married to Leona Norton Shearer on August 7, 1862. Father of Tarleton Shearer. Resident in Madison County in 1850. Farm laborer in Madison County in 1860. Household owned six enslaved persons in Madison County in 1860.
